message.content:
Write .env.example for an Adobe UXP plugin with AI services and subscription features at /Users/imorgado/Documents/agent-girl/chat-590e9991/sneaky-music/.env.example

Document these environment variables:
- AI Provider settings (OpenAI/Anthropic API keys)
- Subscription API URL and tokens
- Adobe Exchange credentials
- Debug/development flags

Write the file directly - clear comments explaining each variable.

content.text: I'll create a comprehensive `.env.example` file for the Adobe UXP plugin with AI services and subscription features.

input.content:
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# Sneaky Music - Adobe UXP Plugin Environment Configuration
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values
# NEVER commit .env with real credentials to version control
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# AI PROVIDER CONFIGURATION
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# OpenAI API Configuration
# Get your API key from: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-proj-...
OPENAI_MODEL=gpt-4o-mini
OPENAI_MAX_TOKENS=4096
OPENAI_TEMPERATURE=0.7

# Anthropic API Configuration
# Get your API key from: https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-ant-...
ANTHROPIC_MODEL=claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022
ANTHROPIC_MAX_TOKENS=4096
ANTHROPIC_TEMPERATURE=0.7

# Default AI Provider (openai | anthropic)
AI_PROVIDER=openai

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# SUBSCRIPTION & LICENSING
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Subscription API Endpoint
# Your backend service for license validation and subscription management
SUBSCRIPTION_API_URL=https://api.yourdomain.com/v1

# API Authentication Token
# Backend service authentication for license checks
SUBSCRIPTION_API_TOKEN=your-backend-api-token

# License Validation Settings
LICENSE_CHECK_INTERVAL=86400000
LICENSE_GRACE_PERIOD=259200000

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# ADOBE EXCHANGE CREDENTIALS
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Adobe Exchange App ID
# Found in Adobe Developer Console: https://developer.adobe.com/console
ADOBE_APP_ID=your-app-id

# Adobe Exchange Secret
# Used for secure communication with Adobe services
ADOBE_APP_SECRET=your-app-secret

# Adobe IMS Client ID
# For Adobe Identity Management System integration
ADOBE_IMS_CLIENT_ID=your-ims-client-id

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# DEVELOPMENT & DEBUGGING
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Environment Mode (development | production)
NODE_ENV=development

# Debug Mode
# Enable verbose logging for troubleshooting
DEBUG=true

# Debug Categories (comma-separated)
# Options: ai, subscription, audio, ui, all
DEBUG_CATEGORIES=all

# Mock API Responses
# Use mock data instead of real API calls (useful for offline development)
USE_MOCK_API=false

# Skip License Validation
# Bypass subscription checks during development (never use in production)
SKIP_LICENSE_CHECK=false

# Enable Source Maps
# Include source maps for easier debugging
GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# FEATURE FLAGS
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Enable experimental features
ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_FEATURES=false

# Enable telemetry and analytics
ENABLE_TELEMETRY=true

# Maximum audio file size in MB
MAX_AUDIO_FILE_SIZE=100

# Cache duration for AI responses in milliseconds
AI_RESPONSE_CACHE_DURATION=3600000

toolUseResult.content:

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

OPENAI_MODEL=gpt-4o-mini
OPENAI_MAX_TOKENS=4096
OPENAI_TEMPERATURE=0.7

# Anthropic API Configuration
# Get your API key from: https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys

ANTHROPIC_MODEL=claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022
ANTHROPIC_MAX_TOKENS=4096
ANTHROPIC_TEMPERATURE=0.7

# Default AI Provider (openai | anthropic)
AI_PROVIDER=openai

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# SUBSCRIPTION & LICENSING
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Subscription API Endpoint

SUBSCRIPTION_API_URL=https://api.yourdomain.com/v1

# API Authentication Token

# License Validation Settings
LICENSE_CHECK_INTERVAL=86400000
LICENSE_GRACE_PERIOD=259200000

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Skip License Validation

     2→# Sneaky Music - Adobe UXP Plugin Environment Configuration
     3→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
     4→# Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values
     5→# NEVER commit .env with real credentials to version control
     6→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
     7→
     8→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
     9→# AI PROVIDER CONFIGURATION
    10→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
    11→
    12→# OpenAI API Configuration

    14→OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-proj-...
    15→OPENAI_MODEL=gpt-4o-mini
    16→OPENAI_MAX_TOKENS=4096
    17→OPENAI_TEMPERATURE=0.7
    18→
    19→# Anthropic API Configuration
    20→# Get your API key from: https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys
    21→ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-ant-...
    22→ANTHROPIC_MODEL=claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022
    23→ANTHROPIC_MAX_TOKENS=4096
    24→ANTHROPIC_TEMPERATURE=0.7
    25→
    26→# Default AI Provider (openai | anthropic)
    27→AI_PROVIDER=openai
    28→
    29→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
    30→# SUBSCRIPTION & LICENSING
    31→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
    32→
    33→# Subscription API Endpoint
    34→# Your backend service for license validation and subscription management
    35→SUBSCRIPTION_API_URL=https://api.yourdomain.com/v1
    36→
    37→# API Authentication Token
    38→# Backend service authentication for license checks
    39→SUBSCRIPTION_API_TOKEN=your-backend-api-token
    40→

    42→LICENSE_CHECK_INTERVAL=86400000
    43→LICENSE_GRACE_PERIOD=259200000
    44→

    48→

    50→# Found in Adobe Developer Console: https://developer.adobe.com/console

    55→ADOBE_APP_SECRET=your-app-secret
    56→

    58→# For Adobe Identity Management System integration
    59→ADOBE_IMS_CLIENT_ID=your-ims-client-id
    60→
    61→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
    62→# DEVELOPMENT & DEBUGGING
    63→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
    64→
    65→# Environment Mode (development | production)
    66→NODE_ENV=development
    67→
    68→# Debug Mode
    69→# Enable verbose logging for troubleshooting
    70→DEBUG=true
    71→
    72→# Debug Categories (comma-separated)
    73→# Options: ai, subscription, audio, ui, all
    74→DEBUG_CATEGORIES=all
    75→
    76→# Mock API Responses
    77→# Use mock data instead of real API calls (useful for offline development)
    78→USE_MOCK_API=false
    79→
    80→# Skip License Validation
    81→# Bypass subscription checks during development (never use in production)
    82→SKIP_LICENSE_CHECK=false
    83→
    84→# Enable Source Maps
    85→# Include source maps for easier debugging
    86→GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true
    87→
    88→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
    89→# FEATURE FLAGS
    90→# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
    91→
    92→# Enable experimental features
    93→ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_FEATURES=false
    94→
    95→# Enable telemetry and analytics
    96→ENABLE_TELEMETRY=true
    97→
    98→# Maximum audio file size in MB
    99→MAX_AUDIO_FILE_SIZE=100
   100→
   101→# Cache duration for AI responses in milliseconds
   102→AI_RESPONSE_CACHE_DURATION=3600000
   103→

file.content:
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# Sneaky Music - Adobe UXP Plugin Environment Configuration
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values
# NEVER commit .env with real credentials to version control
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# AI PROVIDER CONFIGURATION
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# OpenAI API Configuration
# Get your API key from: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-proj-...
OPENAI_MODEL=gpt-4o-mini
OPENAI_MAX_TOKENS=4096
OPENAI_TEMPERATURE=0.7

# Anthropic API Configuration
# Get your API key from: https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-ant-...
ANTHROPIC_MODEL=claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022
ANTHROPIC_MAX_TOKENS=4096
ANTHROPIC_TEMPERATURE=0.7

# Default AI Provider (openai | anthropic)
AI_PROVIDER=openai

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# SUBSCRIPTION & LICENSING
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Subscription API Endpoint
# Your backend service for license validation and subscription management
SUBSCRIPTION_API_URL=https://api.yourdomain.com/v1

# API Authentication Token
# Backend service authentication for license checks
SUBSCRIPTION_API_TOKEN=your-backend-api-token

# License Validation Settings
LICENSE_CHECK_INTERVAL=86400000
LICENSE_GRACE_PERIOD=259200000

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# ADOBE EXCHANGE CREDENTIALS
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Adobe Exchange App ID
# Found in Adobe Developer Console: https://developer.adobe.com/console
ADOBE_APP_ID=your-app-id

# Adobe Exchange Secret
# Used for secure communication with Adobe services
ADOBE_APP_SECRET=your-app-secret

# Adobe IMS Client ID
# For Adobe Identity Management System integration
ADOBE_IMS_CLIENT_ID=your-ims-client-id

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# DEVELOPMENT & DEBUGGING
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Environment Mode (development | production)
NODE_ENV=development

# Debug Mode
# Enable verbose logging for troubleshooting
DEBUG=true

# Debug Categories (comma-separated)
# Options: ai, subscription, audio, ui, all
DEBUG_CATEGORIES=all

# Mock API Responses
# Use mock data instead of real API calls (useful for offline development)
USE_MOCK_API=false

# Skip License Validation
# Bypass subscription checks during development (never use in production)
SKIP_LICENSE_CHECK=false

# Enable Source Maps
# Include source maps for easier debugging
GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true

# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
# FEATURE FLAGS
# ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

# Enable experimental features
ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_FEATURES=false

# Enable telemetry and analytics
ENABLE_TELEMETRY=true

# Maximum audio file size in MB
MAX_AUDIO_FILE_SIZE=100

# Cache duration for AI responses in milliseconds
AI_RESPONSE_CACHE_DURATION=3600000

content.text:
Created `.env.example` at `/Users/imorgado/Documents/agent-girl/chat-590e9991/sneaky-music/.env.example`

The file includes:

**AI Provider Settings:**
- OpenAI API key, model (gpt-4o-mini), tokens, temperature
- Anthropic API key, model (claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022), tokens, temperature
- Provider selection flag

**Subscription Configuration:**
- API URL for license validation backend
- API authentication token
- Check interval (24h) and grace period (72h)

**Adobe Exchange Credentials:**
- App ID, secret, and IMS client ID
- Links to Adobe Developer Console

**Development Flags:**
- Debug mode with category filters
- Mock API toggle for offline dev
- License check bypass for development
- Source map generation

**Feature Flags:**
- Experimental features toggle
- Telemetry control
- Max audio file size (100MB)
- AI response cache duration (1h)
